question: I'm a 23 yr old female.  I have some long pinkish colored stretch marks on my shoulders.  I noticed today when I took a shower that one of them on my left shoulder had "ruptured" it looks as if it opened up and is bleeding.  I've never seen anything like this before, I've had these stretch marks for a year or so and have never had this happen.  Does anyone have any idea what this could be?  I do have PCOS and type 2 Diabetes, if that matters at all.  Thanks in advance for your advice.
title: rupturing stretch marks
